description:
Exciting Opportunity with a Nationally Recognized Executive Search Firm

Your New Role

Are you an experienced sales professional seeking a new challenge? We are seeking a Vice President of Sales to lead our sales department at a prominent technology refurbishment company based in Roseville. As a key player in our team, you will steer the sales team towards exceeding company revenue targets. This role offers not only leadership opportunities but also the chance to expand the sales team through strategic oversight and innovative sales approaches, with attractive bonus incentives based on performance.

What You Will Be Doing

Sales Strategy: Strategically oversee and coordinate sales team activities, setting territories, quotas, and goals aligned with the company's vision.

Data Analysis: Dive into sales statistics to identify growth opportunities and areas for improvement, monitoring results for accurate forecasting.

Reporting: Provide detailed reports on team and individual performances to inform decision-making.

Innovation: Develop and implement cutting-edge sales strategies to drive growth.

Partnerships: Forge and cultivate partnerships with potential clients to drive business development.

Technology: Utilize sales force automation tools to optimize sales and marketing efforts.

Travel: Embrace travel opportunities, approximately 20% across the US with occasional overseas trips.

Collaboration: Take on additional projects to support the dynamic team's success.

What We Are Looking For

Experience: Demonstrated experience in managing outsourced support systems related to OEM, repair services, field service, or call centers.

Education: Bachelor's degree in business, marketing, or a related field.

Experience: 5 to 8 years in sales or marketing roles with a proven track record of success.

Qualifications: A unique combination of education, training, and experience demonstrating potential for excellence in this role.

About Us

Join a trusted industry leader with over three decades of experience providing workforce solutions across various sectors. With a network of over 75 offices, we excel in executive, professional, commercial, and government verticals. Our collaborative approach focuses on delivering high-quality outcomes tailored to each client's needs. Join our team and be part of a legacy of success and innovation in the executive search field.

Employment Type: Full-Time
